segments.text: What are you going to have for breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just have some cereal each morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're supposed to always have a hearty breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't always have time to make breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's easy to make a quick breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you have for breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I need to make a quick breakfast , I just make some oatmeal , toast , and OJ .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not time consuming at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn't take much time to make ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like me to make something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you make me some oatmeal and toast ?
segments.speaker: S2
